Home

Server-Side Scripting Frameworks

This course will provide understanding of server-side scripting, web application frameworks and web application security

Course content:

  • Node.js
  • Express.js
  • MongoDB
  • WebRTC
  • Socket.io
  • Cloud hosting
  • Web application security
